text: Gary Lee Weiss (born December 27, 1955) is a former shortstop in Major League Baseball who played in 22 games for the Los Angeles Dodgers during the 1980 and 1981 seasons. Weiss's son, Erich, is also a professional baseball player. ==References== ==External links== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Major League Baseball shortstops Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:Baseball players from Texas Category:Blinn Buccaneers baseball players Category:Houston Cougars baseball players Category:Clinton Dodgers players Category:San Antonio Dodgers players Category:Albuquerque Dukes players
title: Gary Weiss (baseball)
